1.title: Malia
1.plot: 18-year-old Joe Major leaves his family behind to go for one final blowout in Malia with his friends and art student Millie Butler goes on her first holiday without her mother. Both unaware that their parents are watching their every move.

3.title: Ayia Napa
3.plot: This week both groups of teenagers hit the clubbing mecca of Ayia Napa. Ladies man David Canning is cutting the apron strings in Blackpool and heading off for one last holiday with the lads before pursuing his ambition to join the forces as a fitness instructor.

4.title: Kavos
4.plot: 18 year-old party girls and life-long friends Becky and Chelsea from Nottingham are about to head off on their first parent free holiday to celebrate the end of their A-levels. With their mates in tow they're off to Kavos in Corfu for what they hope will be holiday to remember... What the girls don't know is that their parents are coming too and will be secretly watching their every move.

5.title: Zante
5.plot: This week two 18 year old boys with completely different lives head off to the Greek party island of Zante. Builder Phil is leaving his family home in Liverpool for a lad's holiday with best friends Mike and Mark. Phil's Dad Bob is a strict former Navy man and is expecting him to behave. Phil can do no wrong in his mum Wendy's eyes; all she asks is that he treats women with respect while he's away

6.title: Magaluf
6.plot: In Corby, Northamptonshire, Royal Marine trained fitness fanatic Rhys is being given strict rules for his holiday from doting mum Vicky. Over in West London 18 year-old student and gymnast Kiran is also preparing for her first parent free holiday before she heads off on a gap year travelling.

7.title: After the Holiday
7.plot:

1.title: Kos
1.plot: This week two teens from very different backgrounds head to the party island of Kos. 18 year old Sophie from Sussex is leaving behind her strict Jehovah's Witness parents for her first holiday without them, while in Kent 19 year old exhibitionist and mummy's boy Ronnie is also looking forward to the freedom of his first lad's holiday.

2.title: Malia
2.plot: It's booze, boys and bad behaviour in the party town of Malia. 18 year old geezer Andy from Kent is leaving behind his doting mum for the holiday of a life time with his best mates. Whilst in Lancashire 19 year old wild child Adina is escaping the clutches of her over protective mum for her first girl's holiday.

3.title: Kavos
3.plot: This week it's Sun, Sex and seriously bad behaviour in Kavos. 18 year old Asher from South-West Wales is leaving behind his doting mum for a blowout week with his rugby mates before leaving for University, whilst in Cambridge 18-year-old hairdresser Charlie is escaping his overprotective parents.

4.title: Ayia Napa
4.plot: This week we're in the ultimate hotbed of hedonism - Ayia Napa. 18 year old Tom is the youngest of three brothers and the last to fly the nest. Now Tom is getting ready for his first taste of freedom as he and his best mates pack their bags for the Cyprus party resort of Ayia Napa and what they hope will be the holiday of a lifetime.

5.title: Ibiza
5.plot: This week it's highs, lows and very bad behaviour in the party capital of Ibiza. Good boy Ollie from Portsmouth is leaving his over-motherly mum who calls him her a munchkin. This will be his first ever trip outside of England with the lads. Over in Preston 19 year old drama student Shannon wants to prove to her Mum and Dad that she can look after herself.

6.title: Zante
6.plot: This week on Sun Sex and Suspicious Parents, 18 year old Kieran from Norwich is heading off on his first lads holiday. Kieran lives at home with his sister and mum Kate, where he doesn't lift a finger. Helping Kieran on his booze fuelled pulling holiday are mates Ben, Sam and Patrick.

7.title: After the Holiday
7.plot: This week we take a look back at this series of Sun, Sex and Suspicious Parents. Tearaway teens went wild on their first ever holiday with their mates, what they didn't know was that their party pooping parents went along too.

1.title: Magaluf
1.plot: This week in Sun Sex and Suspicious Parents, 19 year old party-girl Jemma from Burnley is about to go away on her first and maybe last holiday with her mates before they all go to university. Jemma thinks she's leaving behind Mum Marie and Step-Dad Sean and heading to the holiday island of Mallorca, for a no holds barred holiday in the resort of Magaluf.

2.title: Malia
2.plot: This week on Sun Sex and Suspicious Parents, its sun, sex, and serious drinking in Malia... 19 year old fitness fanatic Dale from Manchester leaves his trusting single Mum behind and 18 year old Tom from Stoke escapes life with his mollycoddling parents for an explosive week with his oldest, and newest friends.

4.title: Kos
4.plot: This week on Sun Sex and Suspicious Parents, two very different teens are about to jet off to the holiday resort of Kos. 18 year-old mummy's girl Chani doesn't have to lift a finger at home as mum Kim waits on her hand and foot. And up till now, mum's been happy to keep her head firmly in the sand when it comes to her daughters wild social life.

6.title: Kavos
6.plot: This week two 19 year old homebodies are heading off to the Greek party town of Kavos. 19 year old Olly lives in Bath with Mum Debbie and ex-army Dad Alan, who do everything for him. He's found himself in a directionless rut since his A-levels and is currently working in the family run garage, but is less than enthusiastic about it.

7.title: Ayia Napa
7.plot: This week two teens from different walks of life are hitting Ayia Napa, the clubbing capital of Cyprus for cheap booze, dirty dancing and a bit of independence away from their parents. Strong-minded and streetwise Ashleigh from South London is escaping her mum's traditional values and is looking forward to rebelling on her girl's holiday with college friends.

8.title: After the Holiday
8.plot: This week we take a look back at this series of Sun, Sex and Suspicious Parents. Tearaway teens went wild on their first ever holiday with their mates, what they didn't know was that their party pooping parents went along too.

3.title: Episode #4.3
3.plot: This week, two groups of boys will be joining the 25,000 party goers that head to Koh Phangan's famous Full Moon Party. What they don't know is that their parents will be there with them... In Leicester 20 year old rugby playing student Callum is excited about getting â€˜off his face in Thailand, however he doesn't know his limits with drink, recently breaking his teeth in a drunken fall.

5.title: Episode #4.5
5.plot: This week our two young people are heading to the beautiful and hedonistic Thai island of Phuket for what they think is their first ever holiday away from their parents, what they don't know is that their parents will be there too, spying on the sly and watching everything they get up to.

6.title: Agi & Billy
6.plot: This week two 20 somethings head to the Thai island of Koh Samui, home of the famous Full Moon parties, where thousands of Brits flock to party all night and drink copious bucket of booze. Indecisive 22 year old Agi lives In Essex with her Mum. Having previously dropped out of three university degrees she is about to start her fourth and is feeling the pressure.

imdb.title: Sun... Sex & Suspicious Parents
plot: Teenagers take their first summer holiday abroad without their parents, who are secretly watching everything that unfolds.
